text: The Punisher is a 1989 American vigilante action thriller movie directed by Mark Goldblatt and was based on the Marvel Comics' character of same name. It stars Dolph Lundgren, Louis Gossett, Jr., Jeroen Krabb√© , Kim Miyori, Bryan Marshall, Todd Boyce, Brian Rooney, Nancy Everhand and was distributed by New World International. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 action movies Category:1989 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Vigilante movies Category:Movies about abduction
title: The Punisher (1989 movie)
